most_active_tickets.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Bugs and Performance Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing various issues with Pieces OS, including login failures due to verification codes not arriving, significant performance slowdown in the VS Code extension after sending multiple messages, and inability to update or view past week's tasks in workstreams.  The login issue might be related to email delivery problems or account issues. The performance issues could be due to memory leaks or inefficient processing. The workstream issue might involve data synchronization or UI bugs.

related_issues.title: Can't login/authentication message won't arrive
related_issues.text:
Can't login/authentication message won't arrive
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I haven't been online a lot because of personal issues. Yesterday I restarted pieces for the first time in weeks, and it said I needed to sign in before I can continue.
First the sign in link wouldn't work. Then I noticed there was a Pieces OS update too. After I clicked that update I got back to the same screen and the link would work.
So I entered my mail address and it said I should get a verification code, which never arrived. So I tried again later and still nothing happened. I decided to let it rest until today and try it again, but still the same result.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
related_issues.text:
UI in Pieces OS for VS Code is extremely slow after sending several messages
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, VS Code, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After sending several messages to Pieces Copilot in the extension for VS Code, there is a significant performance drop to the program which leads to the app eventually becoming extremely slow and difficult to use when pressing buttons, using keyboard input, and the speed of which a LLM responds. CPU usage and RAM usage also spikes when this occurs.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
related_issues.text:
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I opened #753.
Now, Today's workstream is being updated but still I can't update last week activities with refresh button(select last week)

Is it good to think I can't revive last week tasks or I will be fixed?

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e177dccd-caea-46b9-bdbb-d3f4e88bfc84)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/91b7556d-d795-4e3d-8396-3b81cda2770d)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving the login issue (ticket #759) as it blocks users from accessing the platform.
Investigate and address the performance issues in the VS Code extension (ticket #762) to improve user experience.
Look into the workstream update problem (ticket #763) to ensure data consistency.
Improve email deliverability to prevent future login issues related to verification codes.
Optimize the VS Code extension to handle multiple messages efficiently and prevent performance degradation.
Verify data synchronization and UI functionality within workstreams to resolve update issues.
Monitor Pieces OS for bugs and performance issues and proactively address them to prevent widespread user impact.
